Frontend application with user-friendly interface for browsing and booking car rentals
Backend API service that connects to PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables
Car browsing functionality with filtering and search capabilities
Date and time selection interface for rental periods
Car booking system with reservation confirmation
Booking history and record management for users
Multiple payment method integration (credit card, PayPal, etc.)
Order management dashboard for tracking reservations
User authentication and account management system
Responsive design with papaya whip background and dark orange components
Database schema for cars, bookings, users, and payments
API endpoints for fetching car inventory and availability
Booking status tracking and management features
Payment processing and transaction handling system
Concurrent development setup with npm scripts for installation and running both frontend and backend
